text: Xinyi railway station () is a station on Longhai railway in Xinyi, Xuzhou, Jiangsu. ==History== The station was established in 1925. Formerly named as Xin'anzhen railway station (), the station was changed to the current name in 1952, to differentiate it from Xin'an County in Luoyang, Henan. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Jiangsu Category:Stations on the Longhai Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1925
title: Xinyi railway station
